summary: SummaryDearcloud's New/Youth Collagen Cream Moisturizer firms and promotes exceptionally smooth, bouncy skin. Infused with Algae and Collagen to help achieve a dewy, plump complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight replenishing moistureHelps brighten dark spotsSkin-nourishing antioxidants promote a bouncy, firm touchMade in KoreaKey IngredientsCollagen: Helps plump and firm for a bouncy-smooth finishAlgae: Helps retain moisture levels and promotes a youthful radianceNiacinamide: Helps minimize the appearance of pores, redness, and blemishesFormulated WithoutParabenSulfateItem 2625742How To UseCleanse your skin before moisturizing.Apply generously onto your face and body during morning and night.Gently pat into face, neck, and décolletage.Precautions: Effectiveness may vary per skin type. For external use only. Stop use immediately and consult a physician if irritation occurs.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyacrylate-13, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Arginine, Carbomer, Polyisobutene, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Betaine, Trehalose, Polysorbate 60, Ethylhexylglycerin, Allantoin, Fragrance, Polysorbate 20, Sorbitan Isostearate, Disodium EDTA, Niacinamide, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Fragaria Chiloensis (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Royal Jelly Extract, Propolis Extract, Algae Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Leuconostoc Ferment Filtrate.
how_to_use: Cleanse your skin before moisturizing.Apply generously onto your face and body during morning and night.Gently pat into face, neck, and décolletage.Precautions: Effectiveness may vary per skin type. For external use only. Stop use immediately and consult a physician if irritation occurs.

reviews.headline: Made me itch :(
reviews.comments: Really wanted to love this after seeing so many good reviews. Unfortunately, within 5 minutes of putting it on my face, I got super itchy and red :( might just be me but a bit bummed out!

reviews.headline: dearcloud Moisturizer
reviews.comments:
I really loved this product at first as it smells nice, has a lightweight feel and gave me the hydration I wanted. However, I started having comedones form on parts of my face I have never had issues with before. I'm unsure of which ingredient was causing them to form but this was the only new product in my routine that I used. 

After I stopped using it, I treated with acids to try and resurface a bit and after few weeks they went away and my skin is smooth but man did I want to pick at my skin during that.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: It goes on so smootly and feels great on my skin. It moisturizes my skin without making me oily. Packaging is a plus, really cute. I really like this and will repurchase.

reviews.headline: great moisturizer
reviews.comments: been using this for going on 9 months every night and day and love that it's not greasy on the skin. it's very hydrating but does not feel heavy. this is definitely a staple in my skincare routine

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer except for the smell
reviews.comments: I just got into Korean skincare and was happy to find a small section of it at ULTA. This moisturizer was in my price range and cruelty free so I took a chance on it. I love everything about it except the smell. It's not unpleasant just too strong for my liking. Luckily the smell doesnt linger. I like that its lightwieght and absorbs well.

reviews.headline: Not for dry skin baddies
reviews.comments: If you're a dry skin girly that struggles to find a moisturizer thats hydrating enough, this is not it! This does not hydrate my skin. Save your coin to purchase a moisturizer that works. Would give it a try if you have normal/oily skin though!

reviews.headline: A Dream Moisturizer for Sensitive, Normal-to-Dry Skin
reviews.comments:
I have sensitive skin that doesn't need much, and I rarely break out—except when I try new products. After a terrible experience with La Roche-Posay, I stumbled across Dear Cloud, and it has been an absolute dream!

This moisturizer is lightweight, non-greasy, and perfectly hydrates my skin without feeling heavy. I love how smooth and comfortable it feels—so much so that I actually look forward to applying it every day. It absorbs beautifully, leaving my skin feeling soft, nourished, and balanced. If you have normal to dry skin and want something gentle yet effective, I highly recommend Dear Cloud!

reviews.headline: It's ok
reviews.comments: I have acne-prone, combination skin. I can't really fault this product, nor say whether I recommend it, because combination skin is so tricky (needs something lightweight, but not TOO lightweight, etc). In my case, other than not being moisturizing enough in certain sensitive areas of my face, I don't think I noticed any changes (like more or less breakouts, and things like that) while using this. For me, this product was really just OK. So, I won't be repurchasing, since I've tried other products that have actually shown positive changes on my skin (but they were pricier *sobs*). That being said, for the price, I think this moisturizer is worth checking out. You never know, it might be the one for you! :)

reviews.headline: Repurchasing
reviews.comments: This is my new favorite face cream! I hate creams that feel heavy on the face and this is perfect. I love the smell as well. It feels fresh on the face, totally recommend!

reviews.headline: Dreamy Product for Dry Skin
reviews.comments: I wish there was more product in the container, but it's a lovely little moisturizer that gets the job done for my dry skin in the cold season.

reviews.headline: Highly recommend!!
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for about a week now, it's a personal goal of mine to take better care of my skin this year and this was one of my first purchases. I have combo type skin and I've been using this for about a week now. I'm in love with the results so far, its a light and watery moisturizer and the finish doesnt feel super thick like most western moisturizers. It's definitely helped my skin feel alot healthier and brought back alot of life! It has a mildly strong perfume scent to it so be aware of that before purchasing, but honestly I dont mind it. It's not anything overpowering or headache inducing for me like some other products

reviews.headline: 10/10 recommend
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this moisturizer. It works like a charm and it dries pretty quickly. I hate moisturizer thay stays wet. This moisturizer is literally everything you want in a moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Decent product, horrible packaging
reviews.comments: The product itself is good- a nice lightweight moisturizer. But while the packaging is super cute, it's just not practical. I got about halfway through the product when the pump stopped working because the base is too wide. I have had this bottle sitting upside down, without the pump, on my dresser for about a month. Not great.

reviews.headline: Worth a try!!!
reviews.comments: I've been trying to find a moisturizer with cleaner ingredients and this one has good ingredients! Ive used it for about a week now and i have to say it does a great job on moisturizing especially for the winter season! I do have acne prone skin and i am purging a little bit but nothing crazy! I'll continue to wear and see how it adjusts! Overall worth a try!

reviews.headline: Skin looks amazing
reviews.comments: I have very oily and problematic skin and this stuff has really been a gamechanger! It's very lightweight but does a great job on its own or under foundation. Would recommend!!

reviews.headline: My new holy grail!
reviews.comments: Love this product so much! Super light weight, non-greasy, and lightly fragranced!

reviews.headline: Like it!
reviews.comments: This is priced right and works nicely! Skin feels good. Yet to see results but pleasant experience!

reviews.headline: I wish I could like this
reviews.comments: Sadly this just was not great for my skin, it is very light weight but does not hydrate my skin at all and has actually made it very dry now. I have normal/combination skin

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is really good especially because I have sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Good moisturizer
reviews.comments: If you want a lightweight moisturizer that doesnt feel thick of like it leaves s layer of cream on your face this is perfect for you. I love how my skin soaks it in immediately and how hydrated and refreshed I feel after applying it. Definitely becoming a mist have skin care brand.

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been using this product for about a week now, it's a personal goal of mine to take better care of my skin this year and this was one of my first purchases. I have combo type skin and I've been using this for about a week now. I'm in love with the results so far, its a light and watery moisturizer and the finish doesnt feel super thick like most western moisturizers. It's definitely helped my skin feel alot healthier and brought back alot of life! It has a mildly strong perfume scent to it so be aware of that before purchasing, but honestly I dont mind it. It's not anything overpowering or headache inducing for me like some other products
faceoff_positive.headline: Highly recommend!!

faceoff_negative.comments: My facial skin is normal to oily but occasionally get the dry spots dyring harsh winter months… Initially interested in this product bc of the collagen claims, the beautiful packaging &  was a K beauty brand. Ingredients looked like a lot of hub bub but figured it be worth trying it out given the price point. When applying i initially thought I needed more than necessary but a little goes a long way. once on my skin, it gives a very mineral oil heavy feeling sitting on top which within minutes is absorbed & goes away… still dont like it initially & if i have any sensitive areas like i just plucked my brows or popped a zit, the product will burn & irritate that spot for a bit… i havent really seen much of an improvement in my skin in fact i recently broke out on my chin but could be bc i changed a couple diffrrent products in my regime… this is just not for me, but can see it being an okay moisturizer if youre on a budget. I typically opt for cerave pm moiturizer for night & pca skin moisturizers for day time…
faceoff_negative.headline: Not it
